where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( mi <* mapped_item | ( mi \ representation_item . name = 'design intent modification planar position' ) and not ( 'interconnect_2d_shape_mim.' + 'axis2_placement_2d' in typeof ( mi . mapping_target ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: wr2
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( mi <* mapped_item | ( mi \ representation_item . name = 'design intent modification planar position' ) and ( sizeof ( query ( rep <* usedin ( mi , 'interconnect_2d_shape_mim.' + 'representation.items' ) | sizeof ( usedin ( rep , 'interconnect_2d_shape_mim.' + 'property_definition_representation.used_representation' ) ) = 0 ) ) = 0 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: wr3
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( mi <* mapped_item | ( mi \ representation_item . name = 'design intent modification planar position' ) and not ( 'interconnect_2d_shape_mim.' + 'axis2_placement_2d' in typeof ( mi . mapping_source . mapped_representation ) ) ) ) = 0
